title: So, a new wrinkle to the login issues
body: Now, the login screen says that it cannot connect to the authentication service.  Previously able to play by rolling clock back...

replies.body:
@broporo
I know a great Sybase/Sql company if it would help. What kind of server einvironments do you use? Who would I contact?

Looks like we're having another hiccup with some of our [**login servers**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na). The devs are currently looking into it, but let's go ahead and double check some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case.
jesus Christ for a multimillion dollar company their servers must be   1.99 at Walmart :/
this is not the first time
